description:
http://anidb.net/ch78944 [Natsuki Subaru] is an ordinary high school student who is lost in an alternate world, where he is rescued by http://anidb.net/ch78943 [a beautiful, silver-haired girl]. He stays near her to return the favour, but the destiny she is burdened with is more than Subaru can imagine. Enemies attack one by one, and both of them are killed. He then finds out he has the power to rewind death, back to the time he first came to this world. But only he remembers what has happened since.
Source: ANN

REGULAR.description:
Natsuki Subaru is summoned to a parallel world on his way home from the convenience store. He`s entranced at first by the fantasy world suddenly stretching before his eyes, but the cute girl he believes summoned him is nowhere to be found, and soon enough he`s utterly lost. Then a gang of punks surrounds him, but he quickly learns that he doesn`t have any of the powers that he thought all people transported to a parellel world should have. Just when he`s about to be beaten senseless, a girl appears...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Ende vom Anfang und der Anfang vom Ende
Hajimari no Owari to Owari no Hajimari
La fin du commencement et le début de la fin
The End of the Beginning and the Beginning of the End
始まりの終わりと終わりの始まり

REGULAR.description:
After being attacked by someone the first time, sliced open by Elsa the second time, and stabbed in the back by punks the third time, Subaru should have been dead, but found himself back where he started in the same parallel world every time. He finally realizes he`s acquired the power to go back to the time and place he started from, which he calls "Return by Death." In hopes of changing the fate awaiting Felt, Satella, Old Man Rom, and himself, Subaru takes off for the fourth time.
Source: crunchyroll

Subaru attempts to buy the insignia from Felt and return it to Satella before Elsa arrives at the loot house... but Satella arrives before the negotiations are complete, and Elsa still attacks them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Leben in einer anderen Welt beginnt
Starting Life from Zero in Another World
Une vie qui commence de zéro dans un autre monde
Zaczynając życie od zera w innym świecie
ゼロから始まる異世界生活

REGULAR.description:
After being badly wounded by Elsa, Subaru somehow survived and awoke in the mansion of Margrave Mathers, in the Kingdom of Lugunica.
Source: crunchyroll

Subaru now lives and works in Roswaal`s mansion, working with Ram and Rem, and finally getting Emilia to agree to a date with him. But the day of their promised date never comes as Subaru keeps going back to the day he first awoke in the mansion. He`s confused at the thought that he Returned by Death despite having no memory of experiencing anything deadly, but he`s determined to repeat his previous actions up to the point of fulfilling his promise with Emilia.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Morgen des Versprechens ist fern
Poranek naszej obietnicy nadal jest odległy
The Morning of Our Promise Is Still Distant

REGULAR.description:
Subaru`s first day at the Roswaal mansion begins for the third time. The first time, he grew weak and died of unknown reasons in his sleep, and the second time, he was killed by an attacker. The sound of chains that he heard as he died the second time replays in his mind, waking him in a terrified, cold sweat. He has no idea what the killer is after, let alone who it is, so he makes a plan to leave the mansion on the fourth night and watch for the attack to happen.
Source: crunchyroll

Standing before Subaru is someone he never expected. The truth of the attacker`s identity leaves him bewildered, and he feels everything crumbling around him as he dies yet again. Then, for the fourth time, he awakes on his first day at the Roswaal mansion. This time, the night of the fourth day passes without incident, and Subaru is stunned as he greets the morning of the fifth day... but then the situation takes an unexpected turn.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Retour à la case départ pour Subaru Natsuki
ナツキ・スバルのリスタート

REGULAR.description:
Subaru`s first day in Roswaal`s mansion begins for the fifth time. Determined to save everyone this time, he makes it a point to keep his best smile on his face in order to earn the trust of the mansion`s staff. But although he works his hardest to make them like him, his body begins to have trouble keeping up with his heart`s intentions. Soon Emilia is unable to bear the sight of him struggling any longer and takes an unexpected action...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Denn ich habe geweint, geschrien und mit Weinen aufgehört
I Cried, Cried My Lungs Out, and Stopped Crying
Płakałem i rozpaczałem, aż w końcu przestałem
Sèche tes larmes après avoir pleuré sans répit
泣いて泣き喚いて泣き止んだから

REGULAR.description:
The scattered pieces of the puzzle finally come together, and Subaru realizes for certain that the shaman who cursed him is in the village at the foot of the mountains. He heads there with Ram and Rem and makes sure all the villagers touch him so that he can find out, with Beatrice`s help, who cast the curse. But the truth he finds is not what he expected, and he finds himself rushing toward the village again...
Source: crunchyroll

Subaru risked his life to save the children from a pack of Ulgarm, but he was so powerfully cursed that there could be no saving him. Even Beatrice is unable to undo the complex web of curses on him, and says he`ll grow weak and die within half a day. The only way he can survive is if the entire Ulgarm pack is defeated, but time is not on his side. Subaru is ready to give up when he learns that Rem has gone into the forest by herself...
Source: crunchyroll

Knocked unconscious by Subaru`s attack, Rem dreams of an event in her past that she and Ram would rather forget... a sin for which Rem feels she can never be forgiven. After waking up, she tells Subaru that she`s just committed the same sin again. When the three of them are moments from being cornered by the Ulgarm pack, Subaru takes off to draw their attention so Ram and Rem can escape.
Source: crunchyroll

At the order of the council of elders that manages Lugunica in the king`s absence, Wilhelm and Felis visit Roswaal`s mansion as emissaries. Emilia is required in the imperial capital right away, so Subaru asks her to take him along. Emilia tells him this won`t be a pleasure trip, but a push from Rem and Roswaal ends in her agreement, so Emilia and Subaru head to the capital. Now all of the candidates to be Lugunica`s next king are gathered, and the royal selection is underway.
Source: crunchyroll

As Emilia joins Priscilla, Crusch, and Anastasia in a meeting of the royal selection participants, Reinhard enters the hall with Felt. According to a new prophecy seen on the Dragon Stone, there are five priestesses with the potential to be the kingdom`s next ruler. Reinhard announces that Felt is the fifth priestess, meaning it`s time to formally begin the royal selection, but Felt refuses to have any part in it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 自称騎士ナツキ・スバル

REGULAR.description:
"I just wanted to protect her. That feeling wasn`t a lie. Where did I go wrong?" Rejected by the one who meant more to him than anything, Subaru is still unable to recognize that he may have done something irreversible. He then finds out that some disturbing movement has been detected within Roswaal`s domain, where Emilia and the others are. He`s certain that he can save them somehow, so in spite of Rem and Crusch`s opposition, Subaru makes his way back to Emilia...
Source: crunchyroll

Upon returning to Roswaal`s mansion, Subaru is greeted by an unbelievable sight and wails that this was not what he wanted to happen. Stricken with despair, everything before Subaru starts to go white as, finally, he hears a voice: "You were too late."
Source: crunchyroll

Subaru awakens in front of the fruit stand in Lugunica`s capital yet again. Realizing that he`s in a hopeless situation, he desperately seeks help from Crusch, Priscilla, and Anastasia, but his limited time continues to tick away...
Source: crunchyroll

A mysterious figure appears before Subaru and his traveling companions. As the looming beast attacks with a deafening bellow amidst the darkness and fog, Rem determines that it will be too difficult to escape...
Source: crunchyroll

Subaru laments that he could not do anything or save anyone, and has no options left. Exhausted, he suddenly takes off running at full speed as if he`s made a decision...
Source: crunchyroll

To save Emilia, Subaru approaches Crusch to negotiate the formation of an alliance. His terms are a bit difficult for Crusch to believe, but she can see that Subaru isn`t lying.
Source: crunchyroll

Subaru has devoted everything he had, and done all he could do. His passion has captured Crusch`s heart, as well as Anastasia`s cooperation, and they all enter into the battle against the White Whale together.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ヴィルヘルム・ヴァン・アストレア

REGULAR.description:
Subaru and Rem lose all words at the sight unfolding above them. Just when it seemed they would soon have the White Whale cornered, despite the sacrifices it took to reach that point, the battle takes a turn that no one expected.
Source: crunchyroll

The half of the mercenary army that had been blocking the road during the White Whale subjugation returns to join the main force. Subaru then leads the way into the forest of the Mathers domain, hoping to find and destroy the Witch`s Cult before they can learn of the subjugating army`s movements.
Source: crunchyroll

Subaru and his companions head toward Roswaal`s mansion to evacuate Emilia and all the others there, stopping at the nearby village on the way and beginning to evacuate its residents as well. However, the situation takes a turn that nobody expected...
Source: crunchyroll

Emilia tried to warn the villagers of Arlam that danger was coming and they should evacuate, but was not well-received. As she`s pondering what more she can do, Wilhelm arrives at the mansion with a message...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der selbsternannte Ritter und der hervorragende Ritter
Jijou Kishi to Saiyuu no Kishi
Le chevalier autoproclamé et le chevalier modèle
O Cavaleiro Autoproclamado e o Cavaleiro da Piedade
The Self-Proclaimed Knight and the Greatest Knight
自称騎士と最優の騎士

REGULAR.description:
Subaru and Julius face off against Betelgeuse`s Unseen Hand. However, as one Unseen Hand after another is launched their way, the two heroes find themselves completely on the defensive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nur darum geht es in dieser Geschichte
Ta historia była właśnie o tym
That`s All This Story Is About
Re:ゼロから始める異世界体験

Subaru learns that objects in this new world are named very similarly to the ones in his own.

Re:ゼロから始める休憩時間[ブレイクタイム] - 08

Re:ゼロから始める休憩時間[ブレイクタイム] - 09

Re:ゼロから始める休憩時間[ブレイクタイム] - 10

Re:ゼロから始める休憩時間[ブレイクタイム] - 11

Source: crunchyroll

OTHER.description:
Natsuki Subaru is summoned to a parallel world on his way home from the convenience store. He`s entranced at first by the fantasy world suddenly stretching before his eyes, but the cute girl he believes summoned him is nowhere to be found, and soon enough he`s utterly lost. Then a gang of punks surrounds him, but he quickly learns that he doesn`t have any of the powers that he thought all people transported to a parellel world should have. Just when he`s about to be beaten senseless, a girl appears...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Ende vom Anfang und der Anfang vom Ende
Director`s Cut: The End of the Beginning and the Beginning of the End
Hajimari no Owari to Owari no Hajimari
始まりの終わりと終わりの始まり

OTHER.description:
After being attacked by someone the first time, sliced open by Elsa the second time, and stabbed in the back by punks the third time, Subaru should have been dead, but found himself back where he started in the same parallel world every time. He finally realizes he`s acquired the power to go back to the time and place he started from, which he calls "Return by Death." In hopes of changing the fate awaiting Felt, Satella, Old Man Rom, and himself, Subaru takes off for the fourth time.
Subaru attempts to buy the insignia from Felt and return it to Satella before Elsa arrives at the loot house... but Satella arrives before the negotiations are complete, and Elsa still attacks them.

titles.title: Director`s Cut: Reunion with the Witch / Starting Life from Zero in Another World
Pojednanie z Wiedźmą / Zaczynając życie od zera w innym świecie
Saikai no Majo / Zero kara Hajimaru Isekai Seikatsu
再会の魔女 / ゼロから始まる異世界生活
감독판: 재회의 마녀 / 제로부터 시작하는 이세계 생활

OTHER.description:
"After being badly wounded by Elsa, Subaru somehow survived and awoke in the mansion of Margrave Mathers, in the Kingdom of Lugunica.
Subaru now lives and works in Roswaal`s mansion, working with Ram and Rem, and finally getting Emilia to agree to a date with him. But the day of their promised date never comes as Subaru keeps going back to the day he first awoke in the mansion. He`s confused at the thought that he Returned by Death despite having no memory of experiencing anything deadly, but he`s determined to repeat his previous actions up to the point of fulfilling his promise with Emilia."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Director`s Cut: The Happy Roswaal Mansion Family / The Morning of Our Promise Is Still Distant
Rodzinna posiadłość Roswaala Szczęśliwego / Poranek naszej obietnicy nadal jest odległy
Roswaal-tei no Danran / Yakusoku Shita Asa wa Tooku
ロズワール邸の団欒 / 約束した朝は遠く
감독판: 로즈웰 저택의 단란 / 약속한 아침은 멀고

OTHER.description:
"Subaru`s first day at the Roswaal mansion begins for the third time. The first time, he grew weak and died of unknown reasons in his sleep, and the second time, he was killed by an attacker. The sound of chains that he heard as he died the second time replays in his mind, waking him in a terrified, cold sweat. He has no idea what the killer is after, let alone who it is, so he makes a plan to leave the mansion on the fourth night and watch for the attack to happen.
Standing before Subaru is someone he never expected. The truth of the attacker`s identity leaves him bewildered, and he feels everything crumbling around him as he dies yet again. Then, for the fourth time, he awakes on his first day at the Roswaal mansion. This time, the night of the fourth day passes without incident, and Subaru is stunned as he greets the morning of the fifth day... but then the situation takes an unexpected turn."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Director`s Cut: The Sound of Chains / Natsuki Subaru`s Restart
Kusari no Oto / Natsuki Subaru no Restart
鎖の音 / ナツキ・スバルのリスタート
감독판: 사슬 소리 / 나츠키 스바루의 리스타트

OTHER.description:
Subaru`s first day in Roswaal`s mansion begins for the fifth time. Determined to save everyone this time, he makes it a point to keep his best smile on his face in order to earn the trust of the mansion`s staff. But although he works his hardest to make them like him, his body begins to have trouble keeping up with his heart`s intentions. Soon Emilia is unable to bear the sight of him struggling any longer and takes an unexpected action...  The scattered pieces of the puzzle finally come together, and Subaru realizes for certain that the shaman who cursed him is in the village at the foot of the mountains. He heads there with Ram and Rem and makes sure all the villagers touch him so that he can find out, with Beatrice`s help, who cast the curse. But the truth he finds is not what he expected, and he finds himself rushing toward the village again...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Director`s Cut: I Cried, Cried My Lungs Out, and Stopped Crying / The Meaning of Courage
Ich habe geweint, geschrien, mich ausgeweint
Naite Nakiwameite Nakiyanda kara / Yuuki no Imi
Płakałem i rozpaczałem, aż w końcu przestałem / Znaczenie odwagi
泣いて泣き喚いて泣き止んだから / 勇気の意味
감독판: 울고 울부짖고 울음을 그쳤으니까 / 용기의 의미

OTHER.description:
Subaru risked his life to save the children from a pack of Ulgarm, but he was so powerfully cursed that there could be no saving him. Even Beatrice is unable to undo the complex web of curses on him, and says he`ll grow weak and die within half a day. The only way he can survive is if the entire Ulgarm pack is defeated, but time is not on his side. Subaru is ready to give up when he learns that Rem has gone into the forest by herself...  Knocked unconscious by Subaru`s attack, Rem dreams of an event in her past that she and Ram would rather forget... a sin for which Rem feels she can never be forgiven. After waking up, she tells Subaru that she`s just committed the same sin again. When the three of them are moments from being cornered by the Ulgarm pack, Subaru takes off to draw their attention so Ram and Rem can escape.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Director`s Cut: Demonically Inspired Methods / Rem
鬼がかったやり方 / レム

OTHER.description:
At the order of the council of elders that manages Lugunica in the king`s absence, Wilhelm and Felis visit Roswaal`s mansion as emissaries. Emilia is required in the imperial capital right away, so Subaru asks her to take him along. Emilia tells him this won`t be a pleasure trip, but a push from Rem and Roswaal ends in her agreement, so Emilia and Subaru head to the capital. Now all of the candidates to be Lugunica`s next king are gathered, and the royal selection is underway.
As Emilia joins Priscilla, Crusch, and Anastasia in a meeting of the royal selection participants, Reinhard enters the hall with Felt. According to a new prophecy seen on the Dragon Stone, there are five priestesses with the potential to be the kingdom`s next ruler. Reinhard announces that Felt is the fifth priestess, meaning it`s time to formally begin the royal selection, but Felt refuses to have any part in it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Director`s Cut: Return to the Capital / Self-Proclaimed Knight Natsuki Subaru
Powrót do stolicy / Samozwańczy rycerz Natsuki Subaru
Sairai no Outo / Jishou Kishi Natsuki Subaru
再来の王都 / 自称騎士ナツキ・スバル
감독판: 다시 찾아온 왕도 / 자칭 기사 나츠키 스바루

OTHER.description:
I just wanted to protect her. That feeling wasn`t a lie. Where did I go wrong?" Rejected by the one who meant more to him than anything, Subaru is still unable to recognize that he may have done something irreversible. He then finds out that some disturbing movement has been detected within Roswaal`s domain, where Emilia and the others are. He`s certain that he can save them somehow, so in spite of Rem and Crusch`s opposition, Subaru makes his way back to Emilia... Upon returning to Roswaal`s mansion, Subaru is greeted by an unbelievable sight and wails that this was not what he wanted to happen. Stricken with despair, everything before Subaru starts to go white as, finally, he hears a voice: "You were too late."
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Krankheit, die sich Verzweiflung nennt
Director`s Cut: The Sickness Called Despair / The Outside of Madness
Zetsubou to Iu Yamai / Kyouki no Sotogawa
絶望という病 / 狂気の外側

OTHER.description:
Subaru awakens in front of the fruit stand in Lugunica`s capital yet again. Realizing that he`s in a hopeless situation, he desperately seeks help from Crusch, Priscilla, and Anastasia, but his limited time continues to tick away...  A mysterious figure appears before Subaru and his traveling companions. As the looming beast attacks with a deafening bellow amidst the darkness and fog, Rem determines that it will be too difficult to escape...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Buta no Yokubou / Shuutai no Hate ni
Director`s Cut: A Pig`s Greed / Disgrace in the Extreme
豚の欲望 / 醜態の果てに

OTHER.description:
Subaru laments that he could not do anything or save anyone, and has no options left. Exhausted, he suddenly takes off running at full speed as if he`s made a decision... To save Emilia, Subaru approaches Crusch to negotiate the formation of an alliance. His terms are a bit difficult for Crusch to believe, but she can see that Subaru isn`t lying.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Director`s Cut: From Zero / Battle Against the White Whale
Od zera / Bitwa z Białym Wielorybem
ゼロから / 白鯨攻略戦

OTHER.description:
Subaru has devoted everything he had, and done all he could do. His passion has captured Crusch`s heart, as well as Anastasia`s cooperation, and they all enter into the battle against the White Whale together. Subaru and Rem lose all words at the sight unfolding above them. Just when it seemed they would soon have the White Whale cornered, despite the sacrifices it took to reach that point, the battle takes a turn that no one expected.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Director`s Cut: Wilhelm van Astrea / A Wager That Defies Despair
Wilhelm van Astrea / Zakład przeczący wszelkiej rozpaczy
Wilhelm van Astrea / Zetsubou ni Aragau Kake
ヴィルヘルム・ヴァン・アストレア / 絶望に抗う賭け
감독판: 빌헬름 반 아스트레아 / 절망에 맞서는 도박

OTHER.description:
The half of the mercenary army that had been blocking the road during the White Whale subjugation returns to join the main force. Subaru then leads the way into the forest of the Mathers domain, hoping to find and destroy the Witch`s Cult before they can learn of the subjugating army`s movements. 
Subaru and his companions head toward Roswaal`s mansion to evacuate Emilia and all the others there, stopping at the nearby village on the way and beginning to evacuate its residents as well. However, the situation takes a turn that nobody expected...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Director`s Cut: A Flash of Sloth / Nefarious Sloth
怠惰一閃 / 悪辣なる怠惰

OTHER.description:
Emilia tried to warn the villagers of Arlam that danger was coming and they should evacuate, but was not well-received. As she`s pondering what more she can do, Wilhelm arrives at the mansion with a message... Subaru and Julius face off against Betelgeuse`s Unseen Hand. However, as one Unseen Hand after another is launched their way, the two heroes find themselves completely on the defensive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der selbsternannte und der allerbeste Ritter
Director`s Cut: The Self-Proclaimed Knight and the Greatest of Knights / That`s All This Story Is About / A Moment in the Carriage
Jijou Kishi to Saiyuu no Kishi / Tada Sore dake no Monogatari / Ryuusha de no Hitotoki
Samozwańczy rycerz i najznamienitszy rycerz / Ta historia była właśnie o tym
自称騎士と最優の騎士 / ただそれだけの物語 / 竜車でのひと時
감독판: 자칭 기사와 최우의 기사 / 단지 그뿐인 이야기
